page.title: 09A TYPICAL SATURDAY.
page.content: My{weekend}is nice because I can{lie {in.}I get up at about{10am.}I go {downstairs}and make my{breakfast. Sometimes I make my mum a{cup of tea.} After that I get{dressed and washed. {Then I get}ready to go{town.}My sister goes to{Colne Valley Orchestra}and my dad goes to{work,}he is an{engineer. {We have to}be back from town before{12 {o'clock}because my sister comes back from the Orchestra. We have our{dinner {just}after 12 o'clock.In the{afternoon {I do}some{sewing}or some{housework.}My dad comes home from work at about {5pm.}Then for{tea}we have{ham salad {with cheese.}Then we go to visit my {Aunty.}I sometimes watch{TV.}We go home at about{eleven forty-five. { { {NADINE TAYLOR 11Yrs {PADDOCK J&I SCHOOL
